metadata.title: CVE-2023-22898 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: workers/extractor.py in Pandora (aka pandora-analysis/pandora) 1.3.0 allowsa denial of service when an attacker submits a deeply nested ZIP archive(aka ZIP bomb).

criterions.comment: pandora: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
